DefaultPasswordChanged.description: Indicates whether the user is allowed to utilize the default password.
DefaultPasswordChanged.longDescription: If true, it indicates that the user is allowed to utilize the default password. Conversely, if it is false, the user will be presented with an option to update the default password.
